> <OLD>
>
> Banking hard she altered her course to join Hydras. All the while hoping she'd be able to find confrontation so she can use her new body and weaponry. She will have to see if MegatronX did a good job as she hoped.

<NEW>

Perhaps events were conspiring to help Maxima to get her wish. As
Maxima swung around and began her course back towards Hydras' location
her long range radar could reported back that his location was near to
a large mining mining city complex.  Much of the surrounding ground
was dust, dirt and soot, most of the foliage and fawna habing been
burned away by previous mining in and around the area. What had not
been killed by thgat suffered from lack of light due to the have haze
of smog that hung over the area like some sort of brown fog.

Maxima could make out that the ground itself was broken in spots, deep
pits and craters dotted parts of the landscape looking like wounds in
the earth itself. As she was approaching sight range of the city she
could make out its walls and some of its defensive weaponry, but was
most notable was several jets which seemed to hover over the city like
dark vultures, flying to and fro. Sometimes they dipped down for
something, other times they hovered, thier movements agile and swift.
However it is obvious they were in search of anything that would be
approaching from the air.

So far it did not *appear* that they had noticed Maxima . . .

Preston
